item.title: 对冲基金在澳大利亚 2.6 万亿美元养老金中失宠
item.description: 随着监管机构对澳大利亚养老基金的费用和业绩审查日益严格，世界上增长最快的退休资金池之一正在减少对对冲基金的投资。【原文：One of the world’s fastest growing pools of retirement capital is reducing its investments in hedge funds as regulatory scrutiny grows on fees and performance at Australian pension funds.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司和阿德诺克公司考虑竞购天然气生产商桑托斯公司
item.description: 知情人士称，沙特阿美石油公司和阿布扎比国家石油公司一直在分别研究对澳大利亚桑托斯有限公司（Santos Ltd.）的潜在竞购，因为这两家中东能源巨头正寻求加强其在海外的天然气投资。【原文：Saudi Aramco and Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. have been separately studying potential bids for Australia’s Santos Ltd., as the Middle Eastern energy giants seek to ramp up their gas investments overseas, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 在亚马逊的支持下，萨克斯的所有者即将达成价值 26.5 亿美元的尼曼交易
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，萨克斯第五大道百货公司（Saks Fifth Avenue）的所有者即将以 26.5 亿美元的价格收购尼曼-马库斯集团（Neiman Marcus Group）。【原文：The owner of Saks Fifth Avenue is close to acquiring Neiman Marcus Group for $2.65 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter — a deal that would unite America’s two largest high-end department-store chains in a bid to grab a bigger share of a slowing industry.】

item.title: 波多黎各公用事业公司减债计划失去保险公司支持
item.description: 波多黎各电力局减债计划的潜在修改失去了国家公共融资担保公司的支持，因为上诉法院扩大了债权人的可允许索赔范围。【原文：Potential changes to Puerto Rico Electric Power Authority’s debt-cutting plan have lost support of National Public Finance Guarantee after an appeals court expanded creditors’ allowable claims.】

item.title: 德意志银行美洲 ECM 联席主管在调查中离职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）美洲股票资本市场前联席主管博姆（Beau Bohm）因涉嫌与一名下属有私人关系而于 4 月份离职。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG’s former co-head of equity capital markets in the Americas, Beau Bohm, left in April amid an investigation into an alleged personal relationship with a subordinate, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Endeavour Mining 将取代 Smurfit Kappa 加入富时 100 指数
item.description: 黄金矿业公司奋进矿业公司（Endeavour Mining Plc）凭借贵金属价格的反弹跻身英国蓝筹股指数，取代了斯莫菲特卡帕集团公司（Smurfit Kappa Group Plc），因为这家包装公司在与美国竞争对手西洛克公司（WestRock Co.【原文：Gold-miner Endeavour Mining Plc rode a rally in the price of the precious metal to earn a place in the UK blue-chip index, replacing Smurfit Kappa Group Plc as the packaging company leaves the index following a merger with US rival WestRock Co.】

item.title: 法官支持迪士尼拒绝基金索取代理文件的要求
item.description: 美国特拉华州一名法官认为，华特迪士尼公司不必交出其与 ValueAct Capital Management 公司的关系记录，以及该激进投资者在娱乐巨头董事会激烈的代理权争夺中扮演的角色。【原文：Walt Disney Co. doesn’t have to turn over records about its ties to ValueAct Capital Management and the activist investor’s role in a bitter proxy fight at the over the entertainment giant’s board, a Delaware judge concluded.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜交易增加，华尔街警惕拜登下台
item.description: 华盛顿关于乔-拜登总统是否会放弃竞选连任的争论正蔓延到华尔街，交易员们正将资金转入或转出美元、国债和其他会受到唐纳德-特朗普复出影响的资产。【原文：The red-hot Washington debate over whether President Joe Biden will scrap his run for re-election is spilling into Wall Street, where traders are shifting money to and from the dollar, Treasuries and other assets that would be impacted by Donald Trump’s return to office.】

item.title: 淡水河谷挑选矿业老将乌斯马尔领导基本金属业务转型
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西金属生产商淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）已选择资深矿业高管肖恩-乌斯马尔（Shaun Usmar）执掌其基本金属部门，以提高铜和镍的产量。【原文：Vale SA has selected veteran mining executive Shaun Usmar to take the helm of its base metals division as the Brazilian metals producer seeks to boost copper and nickel production, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管学费上涨，私立大学仍受支出增加的影响
item.description: 高等教育的成本越来越高。【原文：The business of higher education is getting costlier.】

item.title: 经济改革停滞不前，彼得罗调整哥伦比亚内阁
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-佩特罗（Gustavo Petro）对内阁进行了改组，因为这位左派领导人的四年任期即将过半，而他的经济改革旗帜正受到国会和法院的威胁。【原文：President Gustavo Petro reshuffled Colombia’s cabinet as the leftist leader approaches the midpoint of his four-year term with his flagship economic reforms under threat in congress and the courts.】

item.title: 派珀-桑德勒放弃 S&P 500 指数目标，称这种做法 "形式不佳
item.description: 派博桑德勒公司（Piper Sandler & Co.【原文：Piper Sandler & Co.’s macro research team will no longer publish a single-number forecast for where the S&P 500 Index will end the year, calling it an inefficient way to communicate with clients.】

item.title: 三个决定性问题标志着一切风险时刻的到来
item.description: 市场面临的危险与日俱增。在美国经济降温的背景下，我们对 "牛市高峰 "的认识已经有一段时间了。现在，政治风险也浮出水面。【原文：The hazards facing markets are only increasing. We’ve known about “peak bullishness” for a while amid a cooling US economy. Now, political risks are surfacing, too.】

item.title: LL Flooring 因房屋翻新进展缓慢而酝酿申请破产
item.description: 据不愿透露姓名的知情人士透露，LL Flooring Holdings Inc.【原文：LL Flooring Holdings Inc. is considering filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy, according to people with knowledge of the matter, who asked not to be named discussing private deliberations.】

item.title: 欧洲央行斯托纳拉斯认为 2024 年再降息两次是 "合理的
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，最近的通胀和经济扩张数据加强了欧洲中央银行进一步降低利率的论据，今年再降低两次利率是正确的。【原文：Recent data on inflation and economic expansion reinforce arguments for additional interest-rate reductions by the European Central Bank, with two more this year about right, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 胡塞武装船只袭击后，巨型油轮找到了新生意
item.description: 一些世界上最大的石油运输超级油轮正在装载大量柴油，这是也门胡塞武装的袭击正在颠覆全球航运业的最新迹象。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest oil-hauling supertankers are instead loading up vast volumes of diesel in the latest sign of how attacks by Yemen’s Houthis are upending global shipping.】

item.title: 连锁餐厅 Mod Pizza 准备申请破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，快餐连锁店 Mod Pizza 正在准备申请破产。【原文：Fast-casual restaurant chain Mod Pizza is preparing a potential bankruptcy filing, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 拉丁美洲风险投资交易量创 2018 年以来最慢水平
item.description: 拉美地区的风险资本交易创下了六年来最慢的速度，部分原因是该地区的美国投资者撤资。【原文：Venture capital dealmaking in Latin America has hit the slowest pace in six years, in part due to a pullback from US investors in the region.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率五周来首次上升
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率自 5 月底以来首次攀升。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US climbed for the first time since late May.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡与债券持有人达成重组协议
item.description: 斯里兰卡与债权人就 120 亿美元的债券重组条款达成协议，使这个南亚国家在违约两年后更接近完成债务重组。【原文：Sri Lanka and creditors reached agreement on the terms for a $12 billion bond restructuring, bringing the South Asian nation closer to completing its debt overhaul two years after it defaulted.】

item.title: 法院裁定威廉姆斯公司可以穿过能源输送管道
item.description: 路易斯安那州一家地方法院裁定，Energy Transfer LP 无法阻止威廉姆斯公司（Williams Cos.【原文：Energy Transfer LP can’t stop Williams Cos. from building a natural gas pipeline across the path of the company’s own conduit in Louisiana, a district court in the state ruled.】

item.title: 美元创三周最大跌幅，因降息押注导致收益率下降
item.description: 由于数据显示 6 月份美国服务业以四年来最快的速度萎缩，美元创下三周来最大跌幅，导致国债收益率走低。【原文：The dollar dropped by the most in three weeks as data showed the US services sector contracted in June at the fastest pace in four years, sending Treasury yields lower.】

item.title: 成本上升，旅游需求减弱，卖空者瞄准加拿大航空公司
item.description: 由于投资者预计运营成本上升和大流行后消费需求疲软将拖累经济增长，卖空者正瞄准加拿大最大的上市航空公司。【原文：Short sellers are targeting Canada’s biggest publicly traded airline as investors expect rising operational costs and weaker post-pandemic consumer demand to weigh on growth.】

item.title: 美国推动加强与太平洋岛国银行的金融联系
item.description: 尽管洗钱和逃避制裁问题令人担忧，但美国财政部的一位高级官员下周将前往澳大利亚，努力说服全球金融机构与太平洋岛屿上的银行保持联系。【原文：A top US Treasury Department official heads to Australia next week as part of efforts to persuade global financial institutions to maintain ties with banks on islands in the Pacific Ocean despite the concerns around money-laundering and sanctions evasion.】

item.title: 飓风贝里尔考验牙买加 16 亿美元的灾害安全网
item.description: 随着飓风贝里尔向牙买加袭来，死亡人数不断上升，风速高达每小时 145 英里，牙买加 16 亿美元的救灾战略将面临考验。【原文：As Hurricane Beryl churns toward Jamaica with a rising death toll and winds topping 145 miles per hour, it will put the country’s $1.6 billion disaster strategy to the test.】

item.title: 贝恩和 Cinven 考虑联合竞购价值 200 亿美元的赛诺菲部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）和Cinven正在探讨联合竞购法国制药商赛诺菲公司（Sanofi SA）价值200亿美元的消费者健康部门的可能性。【原文：Private equity firms Bain Capital and Cinven are exploring a potential joint bid for French drugmaker Sanofi SA’s $20 billion consumer health division, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 民主党顶级捐赠人称拜登有五天时间做出决定
item.description:
迈尔斯预计将有更多来自总统所属政党的政治家要求总统下台

。【原文：

Myers expects more politicians from the President’s party to call for him to step aside

】

item.title: Frontier、Stonepeak 讨论最高达 10 亿美元的光纤合资事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Frontier Communications Parent Inc. 正与 Stonepeak 就组建合资企业进行光纤投资谈判。【原文：Frontier Communications Parent Inc. is in talks with Stonepeak about forming a joint venture for fiber investment, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 西班牙五月份美国原油进口量创历史新高
item.description: 西班牙 5 月份从美国进口的原油量创下历史新高，这是 WTI 米德兰旗舰级原油供应在欧洲市场站稳脚跟的最新迹象。【原文：Spain imported a record volume of crude oil from the US in May, in the latest sign of how supplies of the flagship WTI Midland grade have gained a foothold in the European market.】

item.title: 美国银行美洲股票研究主管 Daire Browne 离开银行
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）美洲股票研究主管在为该公司及其前身美林证券（Merrill Lynch）工作二十多年后即将离职。【原文：Bank of America Corp.’s head of Americas equity research is departing after more than two decades with the firm and predecessor Merrill Lynch.】
